entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SPMI should diff unwind info #112807
    Future
  • Telemetry Baggage proposal #112803
    Future
  • HttpHandlerDiagnosticListener might emit `HttpRequestOut.Start` 2 times for certain hosts with ActivityIdFormat.W3C #112792
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add EditDistance (Levenshtein) to TensorPrimitives for unEqual length <T> comparision. #112784
  • System.IO.Packaging should perform case-insensitive matching when determining part media types #112783
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Operators #112781
  • ArrayPool<T>.Shared returned null #112778
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49826/test49826/test49826.cmd #112773
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/Dispatch/Dispatch.cmd #112772

Closed

  • Serialising an object with a JsonObject or Dictionary property does not respect JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull #112785
  • Host.TryExecuteBackgroundServiceAsync logic #112600
  • DeflateStream does not return a filled buffer when it hits the end of an inflater block, and BufferedStream doesn't keep requesting until it is full #112673
  • JIT: Missed optimization for integer `x / y; x % y` #112774
  • Add Cancellation capability to PropertyChangingEventArgs #21624
  • Exposing plumbing for single instance application #35827
  • [8.0][linux-s390x] Build failure in hostpolicy #112435
  • Creating Property of Generic Type fails when creating an Assembly using Reflection.Emit and MetadataLoadContext. #112155
    10.0.0
  • Repo build using checked runtime fails with JIT asserts #112635
    10.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Stack Overflow when appending modifiers to TypeInfoResolverChain #112735
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Random.Get{Hex}String #111956
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.Remove overload #111925
    Future
  • Can not build dotnet runtime due to 404 error while installing dotnet sdk v10.0.100-alpha.1.25077.2 #112739
  • X509Store.Add Fails On Ubuntu 22.04 in FIPS Mode #111560
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure 3DES Exports are actually 3DES on all versions of Windows #112806
    area-System.Security
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove unused file Interop.PFXExportCertStore.cs #112801
    area-System.Security
  • Fix JsonNode.DeepEquals #112800
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix the unwind opcode for new APX registers #112799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `Monitor.Wait` unregistration in CoreCLR upon a thread exiting #112797
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [8.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112795
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [9.0] Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112794
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112793
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112789
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Pass SourceBuiltPdbArtifactsDir parameteres to runtime build #112788
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • MemoryCache: use net9.cs file rather than #if for TFM limits #112786
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Differentiate `MethodTable`s that are/aren't visible to reflection #112782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable test #112780
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • [release/10.0-preview2] Pin the net6.0 downlevel #112804
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0-staging] Include PDB for all TfmRuntimeSpecificPackageFile #112139
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.4
  • CoreCLR interpreter basic compilation and execution #112369
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Read back parameter register replacements eagerly #112501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Run profile repair after frontend phases #111915
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Bump downlevel for 10.0p2 #112754
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #111700
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #112008
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.14
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][mini] Disable inlining if we encounter class initialization failure #112005
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.3
  • fixed the clang-20 issue for ppc64le #112777
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Support generic type parameter when created with TypeBuilder #112372
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Use pooled Utf8JsonWriter when doing sync streaming serialization. #112745
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix stack overflow condition when appending modifiers to resolver chains. #112737
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Keep small-typedness information for return temps introduced by GDV #112733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Coretestlib: Add information of parent process id during test failure for Windows #112724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement 'ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.Remove' API #112263
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Random.Get{Hex}String #112162
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix LINQ handling of iterator.Take(...).Last(...) #112714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq, 9.0.x
  • Clarify comments for `ClrRestoreNonvolatileContextWorker`. #112758
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [android][coreclr] Make coreclr build specify `HOST_ANDROID` and include Android logging APIs #112677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-android
  • Change the Unix cert store to store certificates with AES256+SHA256 PBES2 #112749
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use rangecheck in assertprop #112766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [Android] Minimal (and quick) set of changes to make CoreCLR host on Android work #112705
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove thread pointer from AwareLock #112715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Consolidate layout passes into one phase #112004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • testing CI - GC trace #112696
    area-Build-mono
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Include PDB for all TfmRuntimeSpecificPackageFile #112140
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.15
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stackalloc localloc #112168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Emit `cmp (extended register)` on ARM64 to simplify cast-then-compare expressions #112411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Use zero register as argument for atomics #112693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove ILLink support for field init substitutions #107380
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Record and replay `notifyInstructionSetUsage` properly #112764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
